name: Notes App
body:
## Notes App
Application allows you to quickly note your thoughts or any other textual information you can enter with keyboard. Just plain text, nothing else. And that's why this application has strict list of permissions.

### Screenshots
*Here will be screenshots, a bit later.*

### Download
You can download APK file for 0.0.3 version [here](https://github.com/burdiuz/ionic-notes-app/raw/master/ionicnotesapp-release.apk). Works on Android 4.1.1 or newer.

### Developer Info
This application was built using [Ionic Framework](http://ionicframework.com) and [Apache Cordova project](https://cordova.apache.org). For Icon I've used [icon](https://www.iconfinder.com/icons/206467/analytics_keynote_note_notes_icon#size=512) found on [IconFinder service](https://www.iconfinder.com/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
